data.message:
I hope you may have seen the lyrics I sent to you
 Lord Marshall ask you can view them and that I may have achieved
 do you like them, because I am in a situation that I'm not happy
 may have experienced this in your life sleeping on a mattress on the floor,
 nightly hope you can help me in my career, because I want to have a person who can be decent and honest so I can also help you with all the respect I have and admiration I thank'm not asking it to achieve fame at contrary is because I want to make good music and be recognized for my talents with lyricist thank Mr. Marshall Matthers
